RelatedSentence: Â Greek Prime Minister Antonis Samaras Sunday voiced confidence about the country 's exit from a painful four - year debt crisis , as the first round of local elections got underway .
In a democratic manner and with unity we are exiting the crisis , Xinhua quoted the conservative leader as saying , after he voted at the southern Greek city of Pylos .
